trans-unit.source: Specifies the rows or columns that are resized by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir rader eller kolonner som skaleres av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: Denne opplistingen til å angi verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Diskplass er distribuert basert på verdien for den <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between rows, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is above that row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>egenskapen angir at diskplass er distribuert mellom rader, under omdistribuering følger disse retningslinjene: – når den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom rad som er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>og raden er over denne raden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is below that row.
trans-unit.target: -Når den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom rad som er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>og raden som er under denne raden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Når <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, er distribuert mellomrom mellom rad som er over og rad som er under raden som er angitt for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Når <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, er distribuert mellomrom mellom rad som er over og rad som er under raden som er angitt for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between columns, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>egenskapen angir at distribueres mellomrom mellom kolonnene, under omdistribuering følger disse retningslinjene: – når den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom kolonnen som er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>og kolonne til venstre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: -Når den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom kolonnen som er angitt for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>og kolonnen som til høyre.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Når <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, er distribuert mellomrom mellom kolonnene som er til venstre og høyre i kolonnen som er angitt for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Når <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, er distribuert mellomrom mellom kolonnene som er til venstre og høyre i kolonnen som er angitt for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is below it.
trans-unit.target: For en vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom rad som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> og neste rad som er under den.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: For en loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom kolonnen som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> og neste kolonnen som til høyre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is above it.
trans-unit.target: For en vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom rad som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> og neste rad er over den.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: For en loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, mellomrom er distribuert mellom kolonnen som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> og neste kolonne til venstre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the rows that are above and below the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For en vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, er distribuert mellomrom mellom radene som er over og under raden som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For en loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, er distribuert mellomrom mellom kolonnene til venstre og høyre i kolonnen som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
